model.name: model
model.tooltip: Select SAM3 model file to load

segmentor.name: segmentor
segmentor.tooltip: Choose between image or video segmentation mode

device.name: device
device.tooltip: Device to load the model on

sam3_model.name: sam3_model
sam3_model.tooltip: SAM3 model loaded from LoadSam3Model node

images.name: images
images.tooltip: Input image or images to segment

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text description of objects to segment (e.g., 'a cat', 'person')

keep_model_loaded.name: keep_model_loaded
keep_model_loaded.tooltip: Keep model in VRAM after inference

add_background.name: add_background
add_background.tooltip: Add background color to segmented images

sam3_model.name: sam3_model
sam3_model.tooltip: SAM3 model loaded from LoadSam3Model node (must be video mode)

session_id.name: session_id
session_id.tooltip: Optional session ID to resume a previous tracking session

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text description of objects to track (e.g., 'person', 'car')

score_threshold_detection.name: score_threshold_detection
score_threshold_detection.tooltip: Confidence threshold for detections, default is 0.5

new_det_thresh.name: new_det_thresh
new_det_thresh.tooltip: Threshold for a detection to be added as a new object, default is 0.7

object_frame_index.name: object_frame_index
object_frame_index.tooltip: Object Frame index to start tracking from

start_to_propagate.name: start_to_propagate
start_to_propagate.tooltip: Propagation direction: disabled, both, forward, or backward

start_frame_index.name: start_frame_index
start_frame_index.tooltip: Frame index to start propagation from

keep_model_loaded.name: keep_model_loaded
keep_model_loaded.tooltip: Keep model in VRAM after inference

extra_config.name: extra_config
extra_config.tooltip: Extra configuration for the SAM3 model

0.name: masks
0.tooltip: Tracked segmentation masks for all frames

assoc_iou_thresh.name: assoc_iou_thresh
assoc_iou_thresh.tooltip: IoU threshold for detection-to-track matching (loose threshold, e.g., 0.1-0.5)

trk_assoc_iou_thresh.name: trk_assoc_iou_thresh
trk_assoc_iou_thresh.tooltip: Stricter IoU threshold to determine if a masklet is unmatched (e.g., 0.5)

hotstart_delay.name: hotstart_delay
hotstart_delay.tooltip: Hold off outputs for N frames to remove unmatched/duplicate tracklets

hotstart_unmatch_thresh.name: hotstart_unmatch_thresh
hotstart_unmatch_thresh.tooltip: Remove tracklets unmatched for this many frames during hotstart

init_trk_keep_alive.name: init_trk_keep_alive
init_trk_keep_alive.tooltip: Initial keep-alive value when a new track is created

max_trk_keep_alive.name: max_trk_keep_alive
max_trk_keep_alive.tooltip: Maximum frames to keep a track alive without detections

min_trk_keep_alive.name: min_trk_keep_alive
min_trk_keep_alive.tooltip: Minimum keep-alive value (negative means immediate removal)

suppress_unmatched_within_hotstart.name: suppress_unmatched_within_hotstart
suppress_unmatched_within_hotstart.tooltip: If True, only suppress unmatched masks within hotstart period

det_nms_thresh.name: det_nms_thresh
det_nms_thresh.tooltip: IoU threshold for detection NMS (Non-Maximum Suppression)

suppress_overlap_occlusion_thresh.name: suppress_overlap_occlusion_thresh
suppress_overlap_occlusion_thresh.tooltip: Threshold for suppressing overlapping objects based on recent occlusion (0.0 to disable)

decrease_alive_for_empty_masks.name: decrease_alive_for_empty_masks
decrease_alive_for_empty_masks.tooltip: Decrease keep-alive counter for empty masklets (no valid masks)

enable_o2o_matching.name: enable_o2o_matching
enable_o2o_matching.tooltip: Enable one-to-one Hungarian matching for existing masklets

suppress_det_at_boundary.name: suppress_det_at_boundary
suppress_det_at_boundary.tooltip: Suppress detections close to image boundaries

fill_hole_area.name: fill_hole_area
fill_hole_area.tooltip: Fill holes in masks smaller than this area (in pixels)

max_num_objects.name: max_num_objects
max_num_objects.tooltip: Maximum number of objects to track (-1 for unlimited)

recondition_every_nth_frame.name: recondition_every_nth_frame
recondition_every_nth_frame.tooltip: Recondition tracking every N frames (-1 to disable)

enable_masklet_confirmation.name: enable_masklet_confirmation
enable_masklet_confirmation.tooltip: Enable masklet confirmation to suppress unconfirmed tracklets
